name: Scientific Living, Inc. v. Basalyga, Appellant

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Scientific Living, Inc. v. Basalyga, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant to pay costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Myron A. Pinhus, submitted a brief for appellant.
William T. Malone, with him Powell and Malone, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Scientific Living, Inc. v. Basalyga, Appellant.
Argued January 12,1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

William T. Malone, with him Powell and Malone, for appellee.
March 14, 1967:
